definition: A condition characterized by an abnormal reaction of the body's immune system to certain substances, typically resulting in symptoms such as sneezing, itching, and difficulty breathing. It is commonly used to describe a hypersensitivity or intolerance towards specific allergens.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Allergie gegen Erdnüsse.
examples.english: I have an allergy to peanuts.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Allergie gegen Katzenhaare.
examples.english: She has an allergy to cat hair.

examples.german: Mein Bruder hat eine Allergie gegen Pollen.
examples.english: My brother has an allergy to pollen.

examples.german: Die Allergie wird durch bestimmte Substanzen ausgelöst.
examples.english: The allergy is triggered by certain substances.
